mapper.insert: insert into document_ref (referencenumber, documentnumber, userid, sortation) values (#{referencenumber},#{documentnumber},#{userid},#{sortation})
mapper.select: select referencenumber, documentnumber, userid, sortation from document_ref
select referencenumber, documentnumber, userid, sortation from document_ref where referencenumber = #{referencenumber}
